Rankings are determined by the average score of ratings by The Dallas Morning Newsâ€™ Texas Golf panel. Panel members rated courses on a 1-10 scale. To be eligible for the Top 100, a course needed to be rated by 12 of the 90 panel members, 13 percent of the panel. Click on locations below to see more info about each course. (Public course price breakdown: Economy: $49 or less; Mid-priced: $50 - $70; Expensive: $71 and up)
